document_title: Fatty liver: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Fatty liver in the early stages often has no symptoms, but is discovered accidentally during liver ultrasound examination. When you have fatty liver disease or hepatitis or cirrhosis, you will have the following symptoms:
Pain and discomfort in the right upper abdomen; Anorexia; There may be yellow skin and eyes, yellow or dark urine; When cirrhosis is present, additional symptoms may appear:; Abdominal ascites, leg edema; Dilation of blood vessels under the skin; Enlarged spleen; Gastrointestinal bleeding; Swollen feet; Red palms; Itchy skin
subsection_title: gan nhiem mo.json. Symptoms of fatty liver

gan nhiem mo.json. Symptoms of fatty liver
